  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Lletra per lletra</string>
            <string language="en">Letter by letter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wort für Wort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À la lettre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Letra por letra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettera per lettera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστολή από την επιστολή</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Cal ordenar les lletres per formar la paraula del nom de l'objecte que surt a la pantalla.
Hi ha cinc grups d'imatges: objectes de l'escola, joguines, peces de vestir, fruites i verdures.</string>
            <string language="en">The letters must be put in order to make up the word in the picture on the screen. There are five groups of pictures: school objects, toys, clothes, fruit and vegetables.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">preescriptura</string>
            <string language="en">pre-writing</string>
            <string language="es">preescritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichen müssen gesetzt werden, um das Wort 
in der Abbildung auf dem Bildschirm zu bilden. Es gibt fünf 
Gruppen Abbildungen: schulen Sie Nachrichten, Spielwaren, 
Kleidung, Obst und Gemüse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les lettres doivent être mises afin de composer 
le mot dans l'image sur l'écran. Il y a cinq groupes d'images :
instruisez les objets, les jouets, les vêtements, les fruits et
les légumes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As letras devem ser postas a fim fazer acima a 
palavra no retrato na tela. Há cinco grupos dos retratos: 
eduque objetos, brinquedos, roupa, fruta e vegetais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le lettere devono essere messe per comporre la 
parola nell'immagine sullo schermo. Ci sono cinque gruppi delle 
immagini: istruisca gli oggetti, i giocattoli, i vestiti, la 
frutta e le verdure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επιστολές πρέπει να τεθούν προκειμένου να 
αποτελεσθεί η λέξη στην εικόνα στην οθόνη. Υπάρχουν πέντε 
ομάδες εικόνων: το σχολείο αντιτίθεται, παιχνίδια, 
ενδύματα, φρούτα και λαχανικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorschreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pré-écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pre-escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pre-scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προ-γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
